content:
I'm glad you asked! Here's my next tweet:

"3/ Nutrition is NOT about deprivation! I used to think I had to cut out all my favorite foods to be healthy, but that's just not sustainable. Now, I focus on adding in nutrient-dense foods and allowing myself the occasional treat. #healthyeating #balance"

In this tweet, I'm sharing another important lesson I've learned on my fitness journey: that nutrition is not about depriving yourself of foods you love, but about finding balance and adding in healthy options. I'm hoping to inspire my followers to rethink their approach to nutrition and focus on making sustainable, balanced choices.
